items.content_html: A lightweight and highly customizable JavaScript/React library for creating small, elegant graphs with additional features like X-axis labels, Y-axis range customization, scatter dots, and support for missing or null values. Perfect for dashboards, data visualization, and trend monitoring.

Perfect for dashboards, data visualization, and trend monitoring.

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight Integrated Development Environment (IDE) built with Electron and Monaco Editor. items.content_html: Simple News App is a lightweight and responsive application designed to fetch and display the latest news articles in real-time. Built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this app provides a clean and intuitive interface for browsing news topics, searching for specific articles, and exploring breaking news stories.
